price: 173. E hicimos que cayera sobre ellos una lluvia (de piedras). ¡Qué lluvia tan terrible para quienes fueron advertidos!
arabic: وَأَمۡطَرۡنَا عَلَيۡهِم مَّطَرٗاۖ فَسَآءَ مَطَرُ ٱلۡمُنذَرِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-amṭarnā ʿalayhim maṭaran fasāa maṭaru al-mundharīna
